_header: Forth came one of the Pharisees
Title(s): The anointing of Jesus’ feet by Mary Magdalene
Subjects: Christ, life of; Mary Magdalene, saint
_description: The anointing of Jesus’ feet by Mary Magdalene: in two parts, narrative and moralisation — 296 lines

BLRoy17Cxvii.First Lines:
FOrthe come on of the phareseusA gret lorde halden emang þe
                    Iewes…
BLRoy17Cxvii.Last Lines:
…ffalsly he held hym selfe reghtwiseÞe warkys of mercy to
                    dyspyce
